data.message:
Use single quotes (#41)

Use single quotes instead of double quotes so the description message is displayed properly ('batteries included' instead of "batteries included")

data.author: Jacob Perron
data.message:
Add launch and launch_ros repos to ros_core variant (#28)

Many, but not all, of these packages were transitively depended on before.
This ensures that all of them are included in an installation of ros_core.

Fixes #26

Signed-off-by: Jacob Perron <jacob@openrobotics.org>

data.author: Jacob Perron
data.message:
Remove ros2msg and ros2srv from ros_core (#27)

These packages no longer exist.

Signed-off-by: Jacob Perron <jacob@openrobotics.org>

data.author: Ruffin
data.message:
Add sros2 to ros-core (#10)

* Include sros2 as a exec_depend ros-core

Facilitate default security by including sros2 in the CLI provided through ros-core

* Remove duplicate exec_depend in ros-core from desktop

Signed-off-by: Steven! Ragnarök <steven@nuclearsandwich.com>

data.author: Mikael Arguedas
data.message:
define ROS 2 Bouncy variants (#1)

* define initial ROS 2 variants

* rename packages to include 'ros_' prefix

* list explicitly rcl(cpp)_lifecycle in ros_base

* add pluginlib to ros_base

* shuffling things around

* ros_desktop -> desktop

* remove 'opinionated' packages from desktop

* update descriptions to match new package distribution
